actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish a 20-year delimiting period for completing a program of education under chapter 34 of title 38, United States Code.

summary.text: Provides that no educational assistance shall be afforded to an eligible veteran beyond the date 20 years after his last discharge or release from active duty if occurring after October 1, 1965. (Amends 28 U.S.C. 1662(a))

titles.title: A bill to establish a 20-year delimiting period for completing a program of education under chapter 34 of title 38, United States Code.
